summary: This mod aims to make the Dawnguard main questline reward. Harkon's Sword, more powerful and worth getting.
descriptionHtml:
Description

This mod simply changes the base damage value of Harkons Sword, the sword obtained after finishing the Dawnguard main questline, to match that of an Ebony Sword. It also changes the value to 500.

I felt that being the reward for completing the questline, it was a huge downfall. The base damage value was eight, which matches the damage value of a Steel Sword.


Requirements

Latest version of Skyrim
Dawnguard


Please leave feedback on the mod! If you think I should lower the damage of the sword or even raise it, let me know!
author: Zediious
